title: Charming North Devon Coastal Heritage Escape with Daily Breakfast & Two-Course Dinner
description:
Standing as a charming example of Victorian elegance, this retreat is steeped in history and is housed in a meticulously preserved building dating back to the 1880s. Step back in time and enjoy the unique heritage of these beautifully appointed rooms with classic period features and modern comforts.

The Bath Hotel is nestled along the North Devon Coast and offers immense coastal views and easy access to the scenic village of Lynmouth, often referred to as "Little Switzerland" due to its alpine appearance and picturesque scenery.

An ideal base for adventure lovers and nature enthusiasts, the hotel is perfectly situated to explore the dramatic landscapes of Exmoor National Park. Its proximity to the harbour offers a charming maritime touch, making it a great spot to experience the quintessential English coast while enjoying the tranquillity of village life.
offer_address: Lynmouth Street, Lynmouth, North Devon, EX35 6EL, United Kingdom
